result.problem: All right. So you can already begin to see a development in intellectual history that perhaps opens the way to a certain ______.
result.chn: 好，所以大家已经开始看到,人类思想史的一个发展,它很可能为某种怀疑主义开辟了道路。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: We have to ______ our team spirit.
result.chn: 我们要加强我们的团队精神。()

result.problem: "I was surprised by the ______ growth in medical technology."
Amy Smith says vampires also ______ to the many local differences across the United States.
Intermediate image, so we can ______ to it.
result.chn: 中间的形象，所以我们可以利用它。()

result.problem: We do not know how to ______ continue.
result.chn: 我们并不知道如何去维持继续。()

result.problem: We have all the information and guidance to ______ you and we realize this opportunity.
result.chn: 我们所有的信息和指导，让您和我们认识到这个机会。()

result.problem: Sometimes simply flying overhead is enough to make the enemy ______ and allow the engagement to end.
We're going to have to ______ it to deal with the obvious fact that you're not dead all the times when you're unconscious and not dreaming.
result.chn: 以便适应人在无意识和无梦睡眠时,并没有死这个显而易见的事实。(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Seeking after happiness has been a most ______ experience , but one that I would not trade for anything .
result.chn: 追求幸福对我来说是十分艰苦的经历，但却是一种用什么我都不换的经历。()

result.problem: You include the ______ diversity of race and ethnicity that is fundamental to our nation's strength."
This machinery is so ______ that a human hair couldn't even pass between the heads and spinning platters, yet it all works in terrific speeds.
result.chn: 这些设备是很紧密的以至于人的头发,都不能在头和旋转的磁盘之间通过，尽管如此，它的运行速度非常快。(计算机科学课程节选 : 哈佛公开课)

result.problem: India's external affairs minister, S.M.Krishna,is expressing concern about terrorist forces in Pakistan that,he says, "______" have India as the object of their attacks.
It was a question of constructing an ______ formal edifice to which everybody could contribute. Students got excited about it.
result.chn: 现在的精读已形成了一种精确而正式的体系,每个人都可以做出自己的贡献，学生当然会对此感兴趣。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)
